== Archives ==

This page gathers old wiki pages to keep trace of our previous work

=== Organisation ===

We will organize the pages in the Archive either by a release name if the page is specific to a release, else we will need the following categories:
* Development
* Documentation
* Team
* Testing
* Translation

=== What to archive ===

All wiki pages that are not currently in use.
